omaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Hello there, young adventurer.
I'm a representative of the
Church of Prontera and I
accept donations from people.
who have already found great
fortune from their travels.
omaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Hello there, young adventurer.
I'm a representative of the
Church of Prontera and I
accept donations from people.
who have already found great
fortune from their travels.

o2aVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Humm..{} is not ready yet.
Once you get stronger and begin
amassing your own wealth,
consider coming back here and
sharing your fortune with the
less fortunate. I'm sure you will
be blessed for your kindness.
<Lv 61 quest or higher>
o2aVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Humm..{} is not ready yet.
Once you get stronger and begin
amassing your own wealth,
consider coming back here and
sharing your fortune with the
less fortunate. I'm sure you will
be blessed for your kindness.
<Lv 61 quest or higher>

pGaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
I accept donation only once a day.
I appreciate your kindness, but could you come back after 20 hours later?
pGaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
I accept donation only once a day.
I appreciate your kindness, but could you come back after 20 hours later?

pWaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Good day to you, kind adventurer.
I'm a worker from the Church of
Prontera. I'm hoping that you
could share some of your good
fortune with the less fortunate
by donating to the Church.
pWaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Good day to you, kind adventurer.
I'm a worker from the Church of
Prontera. I'm hoping that you
could share some of your good
fortune with the less fortunate
by donating to the Church.

pmaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Of course, I have prepared a little gift for you, if you like to donate...
Would you like to donte?
pmaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Of course, I have prepared a little gift for you, if you like to donate...
Would you like to donte?

p2aVBA.en: No,I am not wealthy enough to donate.
p2aVBA.pt: No,I am not wealthy enough to donate.

qGaVBA.en: Yes, I would like to donate!
qGaVBA.pt: Yes, I would like to donate!

qWaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Alright, if you don't want, it is fine. Come back again if you change your mind.
qWaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Alright, if you don't want, it is fine. Come back again if you change your mind.

qmaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
That is right! You are the best!
I only ask that you donate
an amount of zeny appropriate
for your status and I am sure
that in return, you will be
blessed for your generosity.
qmaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
That is right! You are the best!
I only ask that you donate
an amount of zeny appropriate
for your status and I am sure
that in return, you will be
blessed for your generosity.

q2aVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Let me give you a simple explanation.
We have observed appropriate donation amount for each adventure's ability.
^0000FFLV 60~80^000000 should donate 40,000 zeny,
^0000FFLV 80~95^000000 should donate 80,000 zeny,
^0000FFLV 96~99^000000 should donate 200,000 zeny.
q2aVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Let me give you a simple explanation.
We have observed appropriate donation amount for each adventure's ability.
^0000CDLV 60~80^000000 should donate 40,000 zeny,
^0000CDLV 80~95^000000 should donate 80,000 zeny,
^0000CDLV 96~99^000000 should donate 200,000 zeny.

rGaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
So, I would like to accept your donation.
rGaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
So, I would like to accept your donation.

rWaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Oh, I am sorry. but you don't have
enough zenny to donate.
But I can feel your warm heart, thank you so much!
rWaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Oh, I am sorry. but you don't have
enough zenny to donate.
But I can feel your warm heart, thank you so much!

rmaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Thank you very much. May the
Heavens watch over you.
Please come back and donate
again. Many lives will be
better due to your kindness.
rmaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Thank you very much. May the
Heavens watch over you.
Please come back and donate
again. Many lives will be
better due to your kindness.

r2aVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Let me see.. Here it is.
You can donate only once per day. Please keep it in mind.
You can donate again after 20 hours later.
r2aVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]
Let me see.. Here it is.
You can donate only once per day. Please keep it in mind.
You can donate again after 20 hours later.

sGaVBA.en:
[Church Worker]
Thank you very much.
Could you wait a while?
sGaVBA.pt:
[Church Worker]

Could you wait a while?
